author: Tabletop Minions
description:
Much of painting miniatures is learning how to solve problems - not just technique. How do you learn to solve problems?

Vince Venturella and I made ANOTHER GAME! Check out Reign in Iron - miniatures-agnostic demon vs. robot skirmish combat at http://www.reigninirongame.com

I'm a member of The Army Painter Factory Team - and I'm passing the savings on to you! Use code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout to get 5% off of your entire order at http://www.thearmypainter.com or check my favorite Army Painter products at https://thearmypainter.com/tabletop-minions

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/tabletopminions

Official Tabletop Minions t-shirts: http://www.tabletopminions.org

Help support the channel on Patreon, and get access to the Discord: http://www.patreon.com/tabletopminions

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/tabletopminions
Instagram: http://www.inst
title: Learning How to SOLVE Miniature Painting PROBLEMS
